long_description: The Lifeproof belt clip mount works with the LifeProof iPhone 5 case (sold separately) to keep your iPhone at the ready for quick access. Release latch makes it easy to click in or pull out your iPhone with one hand. Light honeycomb construction with premium high-impact materials offers an optimal strength-to-weight ratio. The LifeProof belt clip mount preserves access to buttons, controls and mic; it's adjustable for portrait or landscape orientation and holds the phone facing in or out.
short_description: The Lifeproof belt clip mount works with the LifeProof iPhone 5 case (sold separately) to keep your iPhone at the ready for quick access.
